title: Why do Wilmington police and New Hanover Sheriff\'s depts drive new Camaros and Dodge Chargers? If high speed pursuits are discouraged due to safety precautions, why have a sports car? Not to mention there are less expensive choices to be had.
text:
Police cars are purchased from the lowest bidder under city and state
purchasing systems.
